itemDisplayName: Deploy a simple Windows VM without a Public IP address
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple Windows VM, without a Public IP address using a few different options for the Windows version, using the latest patched version. This will deploy a A2 size VM in the resource group location and return the FQDN of the VM.
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a Windows VM, using the latest patched version.
